title: Tree removal and heritage tree permits
dataVerified: Property owner, address, tree species, diameter, removal justification, city
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (issued/completed). Link to urban forestry/planning department system (enforcement and public, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents unauthorized tree removal. Domain binding verifies urban forestry/planning department. Tree preservation ordinance compliance. Prevents heritage tree destruction. Replacement tree requirements.
